mapper.sql: id, doctor_id, code, practice_level, practice_title, practice_title_code, practice_item, practice_type, check_org, check_date, practice_address, practice_org, practice_org_address, practice_dept, document1_avatar, document1_avatar_type, document2_avatar, document2_avatar_type, document3_avatar, document3_avatar_type, enabled, title_information, is_general_practitioner, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_delete
mapper.select: select id, code, practice_level, practice_dept, practice_type, practice_item, practice_org, practice_org_address, enabled, title_information, check_org, check_date, practice_address, practice_title, is_general_practitioner from doctor_practicepoint where is_delete = 0 and doctor_id = #{doctorId} order by id desc limit 1
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO doctor_practicepoint (id, doctor_id, code, practice_level, practice_title, practice_item, practice_type, check_org, check_date, practice_address, practice_org, practice_org_address, practice_dept,
enabled,
title_information, is_general_practitioner, create_by, update_by) VALUES (#{id}, #{doctorId}, #{code}, #{practiceLevel}, #{practiceTitle}, #{practiceItem}, #{practiceType}, #{checkOrg}, #{checkDate}, #{practiceAddress}, #{practiceOrg}, #{practiceOrgAddress}, #{practiceDept},
#{enabled},
#{titleInformation}, #{isGeneralPractitioner}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE doctor_id = VALUES(doctor_id), code = VALUES(code), practice_level = VALUES(practice_level), practice_title = VALUES(practice_title), practice_title_code = VALUES(practice_title_code), practice_item = VALUES(practice_item), practice_type = VALUES(practice_type), check_org = VALUES(check_org), check_date = VALUES(check_date), practice_address = VALUES(practice_address), practice_org = VALUES(practice_org), practice_org_address = VALUES(practice_org_address), practice_dept = VALUES(practice_dept),
enabled = VALUES(enabled),
title_information = VALUES(title_information), is_general_practitioner = VALUES(is_general_practitioner), update_by = VALUES(update_by)
